DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine whether citrus flavonoid citrus flavonoid formulation improve objective sleep duration and/or quality , and/or improve perceive sleep quality feeling rest . Participants complete total 9 test night , consist sleep sleep monitoring system ingestion test product placebo , fill sleep-related questionnaire . The study crossover design , mean participant receive three intervention ( citrus flavonoid , citrus flavonoid formulation , placebo ) three time , randomized order .
DOC.brief_title: The Sleep Improving Effects Orange Phenolics
DOC.criteria: Age 1875 Nonsmoking Healthy Lightly disturb sleep least six month , regular basis Severe sleep disorder ( sleep apnea , restless legs syndrome ) An apparent cause sleep disorder ( pain , etc . ) Clinically significant abnormal liver function Clinically significant abnormal serum creatinine BMI low 18 high 30 kg/m2 Use concomitant medication supplement
